text_en: In this class the teacher has arranged the students with visual impairment in front of the class. There are both a blackbord and whiteboard since different students have different preferences. Transparent tiles in the ceiling give enough light.
The students with visual impairment are placed together with sighted students.
Then the students can help each other.
The teacher helps the students too.
A sighted peer tells his blind classmate what is written on the board
The students and the teacher xxx together
